answers.answer: I have too hun.  Its normal.  Its a sign of edema.  (swelling)  Its due to the baby putting pressure down there.  It will go away with you deliver.  Anita
I have been swelling since 7 weeks.  It started in my legs.  And I don't have preeclampsia.  I was told that some woman just swell.  Antia

question: Not my vagina, thank goodness. But I have a lot of swelling in the area above it- right around the pubic bone. It is tender to the touch too. I recall  this happened at the end of my last pregnancy, and I was very aware of the lingering swelling there after having my c-section. But, I am only 18 weeks! Did anyone experience swelling (water retension??) there? I am very paranoid about having preeclampsia again. I took my BP this morning- it was nice and low- 108/70.
title: swelling and tenderness in pubic area
